OXYGEN FONTS free, open, and easy to use type for the Linux Desktop

The Oxygen fonts are being created specifically to extend the choice of UI type families available for Free Software desktops and devices.

The Oxygen Fonts are published under the Open Font License and the Gnu Public License.

These licenses ensure that the fonts are freely available.

abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

Boden

POINTED

Enthrones

CONCRETE

Generally Acceptable Reactive Conference

Oxygen is a member of the chalcogen group on the periodic table and is a highly reactive nonmetallic element that readily forms compounds (notably oxides) with most elements except the noble gases Helium and Neon. Oxygen is a strong oxidizing agent and only fluorine has greater electronegativity

the Oxygen Fonts are maintained by vernnobile on github | this site is published with GitHub Pages, Jekyll and Bootstrap
